p: Dearth of treatment for COVID-19 leaves us with no choice but to take precautionary and prophylactic measures to stand a better chance to fight this pandemic. Hence, maintaining adequate Vit D levels is vital to prevent getting infected or to ward off the infection without mortality, in case it occurs. Clinical trials should be conducted in regard to COVID-19 for assessing the effect of Vit D supplementation and determining the appropriate dose. We conclude that correlation exists between Vit D levels and COVID-19 susceptibility and Vit D could prove to be an essential element in our fight against COVID-19.
